Author Pics Default Search

Explore the web effortlessly with Author Pics, your ultimate browsing companion. This extension simplifies your online experience, offering seamless access to search, images, and videos. Elevate your search game with Author Pics default search extension, now powered by Bing!

Key Features:
• Streamlined and quick search functionality
• Relevance-driven results for a top-notch browsing experience
• Swift and efficient search outcomes

By clicking "Get" or "Add to Chrome", you are consenting to the installation of the 'Author Pics' Chrome extension, which sets Bing as your default search engine. Kindly review and agree to our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.

Terms of Use: https://author.pics/term-of-use.html
Privacy Policy: https://author.pics/privacy-policy.html

Permissions and Usage:
Change default search settings to our domain author.pics: This permission is essential for the proper functioning of the extension.
Read and change your data on all author.pics sites: To ensure our product works seamlessly, we require access to the websites under our ownership and management.
